Ich stimme zu, dass meine Antwort zur Au: I agree that my answer may be shared with OpenAI for evaluation. I will make sure not to provide any personal information or sensitive data such as passwords. My input will be evaluated to assess the usability of this feature and the quality of the generated questions and feedbacks.
Einen API-Key können Sie in den Accounte: An API key can be created in the account settings of the OpenAI website. To see these settings, you must log in to your OpenAI account or sign up.
Hiermit geben Sie an, in welcher Sprache: Here you specify in which language the questions and feedback should be generated.
Mit der Erstellung dieses Blockes bestät: I confirm with the creation of this block that the course content of the current page does not contain any sensitive personal data and therefore may be submitted to OpenAI. Additionally, I allow to store my data in order to evaluate the usability of this block and the quality of the generated questions and feedbacks.
Bitte stelle einen OpenAI API Key bereit: Please provide an OpenAI API key.
Bitte stelle den Inhalt der Veranstaltun: Please provide the content of the lecture.
Hier können Sie dem Model zusätzliche In: Here you can give the model additional information, such as a focus on a specific part of the learning content or an instruction.
